article.headline: Coastal Carolina 108, VMI 99
article.story: CONWAY, S.C. (AP) -- Jack Leasure had 28 points and Moses Sonko scored 19 and grabbed a school-record 22 rebounds to lead Coastal Carolina to a 108-99 win against VMI in Big South Conference action Saturday. The Chanticleers (12-11, 5-4 Big South) got 16 points from Steven Sexton, 13 points from Joshua Mack and 11 points each from Joseph Harris and Randon Cavette. Harris also grabbed nine rebounds. Leasure hit seven 3-pointers and Sexton was 4-of-10 from long range. VMI (10-15, 3-6) was led by Reggie Williams with 36 points, Chavis Holmes with 20 points and Matt Murrer with 19 points and 13 rebounds. The Keydets also got 11 points from Travis Holmes. Coastal led by 17 points with 6:03 left in the first half. But VMI cut that to just four points at 42-38 at the half. VMI led by as many as four midway through the second before Coastal pulled away.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
